org.jdrupes.httpcodec

Interface Codec

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Decoder<T>, Encoder<T>, RequestDecoder<Q,R>, ResponseDecoder<T,Q>, ResponseEncoder<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HttpCodec, HttpDecoder, HttpEncoder, HttpRequestDecoder, HttpRequestEncoder, HttpResponseDecoder, HttpResponseEncoder

    public interface Codec
    Author:
    Michael N. Lipp

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Codec.Result
      The common properties of the result types returned by the various codecs.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.nio.ByteBuffer EMPTY_IN
      An empty input buffer that can be used for codec invocations when the (expected) body data is not yet available.

    • Field Detail

      • EMPTY_IN

        static final java.nio.ByteBuffer EMPTY_IN
        An empty input buffer that can be used for codec invocations when the (expected) body data is not yet available.
